label.Shona: Makadii, zita rangu ndinonzi ${q0_12} ndino shandira ku NGO inonzi Goal yakabatana ne UNICEF uye ne Ministry of Public Service, Labour and Social Welfare. Tiri kuita ongororo yemararamiro evanhu mudunhu rinho kuti tigokwanisa kugadzira zvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu. Ndiri kukumbirawo kutaura nemukuru wemba kana aripo asi kana asipo munhu anochengeta vana kana ane ruzivo nezvepamba pano. [Enumerator: Pause, and proceed after confirmation]. Kupinda kwenyu mu tsvakurudzo ino hazvireve kupinda muzvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu, asi tsvakurudzo ino yakakosha. Zvichawanikwa mutsvakurudzo ino zvichangoshandiswa nevandataura pamusoro apo. Hapana umwe asineyi nezvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu achaudzwa mhinduro dzenyu.
label.English:
Hello, my name is ${q0_12} and I work for an NGO organisation called Goal, in collaboration with UNICEF and the Ministry of Public Service, Labour and Social Welfare. We are looking at the social and economic challenges being faced by households in this area, in order to support with development planning and to help us identify and provide relevant future interventions. We would like to speak to the head of household if available and if not to the main care giver or someone who is knowledgeable about this household. [Enumerator: Pause, and proceed after confirmation]

Participation in this survey does not entitle you to any programmes being introduced, but this interview is a necessary part of it. 

The information collected here will be maintained by the three partners mentioned above. The answers you provide will be completely confidential and we will not share information that identifies you with anyone, unless necessary for delivering a programme.

Finally, before we leave could you respond to the following statement:

I confirm that information I have provided is correct and truthful. I understand that my household may be visited again to verify the survey and that falsifying any information may result in removal from any potential programme.

label.English: If you do become entitled to any potential programme, we will have to share your basic information (i.e. name, ID, address, contact details) with those delivering any support (for example to a private sector payment provider).
